## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                      | Type       | Default            |
| ------------- | ------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------- | ------------------ |
| `frequency`   | `frequency`   | The frequency to read the sensor | `number`   | `20`               |
| `movedClass`  | `moved-class` | The CSS class to use when moved  | `string`   | `"microbit-moved"` |
| `sensitivity` | `sensitivity` | The sensitivity of the sensor    | `number`   | `1`                |
| `services`    | --            |                                  | `Services` | `null`             |
| `stillClass`  | `still-class` | The CSS class to use when still  | `string`   | `"microbit-still"` |
